MemberSignature.Value: public static TagLib.Id3v2.Frame CreateFrame (TagLib.ByteVector data, uint version);

Docs.param: A beginning with an ID3v2 frame header.
A describing the ID3v2 version which the frame is stored in.
Docs.summary: Creates an ID3v2.4 frame based from the data provided and version provided.
Docs.returns: An applicable derivative of if the data is valid, otherwise null.
Docs.remarks: The default frame types that are available are contained in this name space. However, additional frame types can be created and added to the frame factory through .

MemberSignature.Value: public static TagLib.StringType DefaultTextEncoding { set; get; };

Docs.value: A describing the encoding to use when saving frames.

Docs.param: A that provides access to a new frame type.
Docs.summary: Adds a new frame creator to the top of the frame creation stack.

remarks.para: Frame creators are used to provide access or support for items that are left out of TagLib#, say syncronized lyrics or a text frame handler that works with badly encoded frames.
